observation: Business Innovation Technologies Inc.  SUPPORT : 1-888-979-9248 SALES : 1-416-840-8900 X 202 Download BIT REMOTE SUPPORT software Menu Skip to content Home Our Services Accounting / ERP Software Implementation and Support Accounting Data Conversion / Migration Accounting Data Import / Export / Integration Managed IT Services / IT Support Cloud Services Data Import as a Service (DI-aaS) Order-to-Cash as a Service (O2C-aaS) Software Solutions Training About Us Contact Us Rapid implementations delivered A full cycle iterative process that is implemented as per Your accounting software is only Data conversion and migration from practically Data import and export from Data import and export from practically any Scan, upload and import invoices It is as simple as 1-2-3. Scan Invoice, Upload to Website, Managed IT and support services Let us manage your technology so you can stay focused Get the most out of your Standard and custom training services for individuals OUR SERVICES To help your business reap the full potential of your accounting / ERP software applications, we offer the following services that fit with your business needs. Rapid implementations delivered on time and within budget Your accounting software is only as good as the data it holds Data import and export from accounting software made easy Managed IT and support services to simplify your IT management Scan, upload and import invoices online from the cloud to your accounting system Training Services Get the most out of your accounting / ERP software CONSULTING SERVICES We offer a full range of services covering both business and technology areas to help you to select, implement and manage your accounting / ERP software applications. Although most of our services involve software applications, we have qualified business professionals to assist you in the areas of accounting, manufacturing/production, operations, and sales & marketing. New Company – Accounting / ERP Custom Software Development Special Projects / System Integration Temporary / Permanent Business Intelligence Custom Reports Data Repair Accounting Data Backup Technical Support – On-site Technical Support SOFTWARE SOLUTIONS We are a solutions consulting organization with the expertise and experience to recommend the right accounting / ERP software based on a thorough assessment of the client’s business requirements. We have relationships with a wide range of vendors to help you choose the right solution. Our expertise covers the following areas : Enterprise Resource Planning Accounting Customer Relationship Management (CRM) eCommerce Manufacturing Business Intelligence & Reporting Electronic Data Interchange Service & Maintenance Warehouse Management Learn how we can help your business Call Us Today Stay Connected Join our Monthly Newsletter We bring you valuable business insights and the latest industry news. ▼

observation: Business Innovation Technologies Inc. | Better Business Bureau® Profile  close Skip to main content Cookies on BBB.org We use cookies to give users the best content and online experience. By clicking “Accept All Cookies”, you agree to allow us to use all cookies. Visit our Privacy Policy Accept All Cookies Manage Cookies Cookie Preferences Many websites use cookies or similar tools to store information on your browser or device. We use cookies on BBB websites to remember your preferences, improve website performance and enhance user experience, and to recommend content we believe will be most relevant to you. Most cookies collect anonymous information such as how users arrive at and use the website. Some cookies are necessary to allow the website to function properly, but you may choose to not allow other types of cookies below. Necessary Cookies What are These cookies are necessary for the site to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you that amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information. Necessary cookies must always be enabled. Functional Cookies These cookies enable the site to provide enhanced functionality and personalization. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies, some or all of these services may not function properly. Use functional cookies Performance Cookies These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance. Do not use performance cookies Marketing Cookies These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant content on other sites. They do not store personal information directly, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser or device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.
